quoteswritten.quotes: Find someone who will change your life, not just your status.
It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
When you win, say nothing, when you lose, say less. -Paul Brown
Give love away like your life depends on it.
Let your past make you BETTER not BITTER.
Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
Stop wishing for it and start working for it.
Do small things with great love.
You can be comfortable or courageous, but you cannot be both.
Train your mind to see the good in everything.
When people don't believe in you, you have to believe in yourself.
Don't pay attention, they don't want you to succeed.
Never lose hope. You never know what tomorrow might bring.
Stop talking about the problem and start thinking about the solution.
I love people who make me smile.
The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them. â€“ Walt Disney
Every new day is another chance to change your life.
Always work hard on something uncomfortably exciting.
LIFE is about Growing and Improving and getting better.
Time goes on. So whatever you're GOING to do, do it. Do it now. Don't wait.
Don't bother telling the world you are ready. Show it. Do it.
I hate that word - 'lucky'. It cheapens a lot of hard work.
Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
Sometimes life will knock you down so you can learn how to fight.
Failure is not the end; It is the start of your comeback story.
Smile in front of people who hate you. Your happiness kills them.
Making mistakes is something everyone does. Learning from them is not.
Be so happy that when others look at you they become happy too.
